items.name: Drubo - Business Corporate WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Business / Corporate WordPress Theme

items.description:
Drubo is an enticing and visually stimulating, tender and polished, professional and responsive WordPress creative multipurpose theme. Drubo is a colorful theme fit for creative individuals, agency, blog, business, company, corporate, and professional portfolio. Its turquoise color adds more sparkle. Make a responsive, mobile & SEO friendly, resourceful WordPress site with a faster Drag & Drop Page Builder, and easy to use. It has lots of documentation that make everything fast to grasp.

To help you get started with your website, Drubo has 5 pre-built Home Pages with several individual pages and a healthy package of features. Drubo has a myriad customization options to help your brand to build trust and convey professionalism. Get your job done with a fuss. A list of Shortcodes to speed the process and quick links are offered.

As well as displaying a large background image, through animated slider, you can easily add photographs to the slideshow. Drubo is a flexible theme, you have the option of displaying a wide range of different type of content in different sections. Your visitors can interact with homepage slider to view your best content as they arrive at your website. You can prefer as your requirements as information about your brand, achievements, your services, items from your portfolio, latest shots, awesome team members & their skills, pricing table, content from your blog, and clients’ comments. All the essential elements are included, this makes setting up your website straightforward with Header & Footer setting, Service setting, Custom Style Google Map setting, and other options. This corporate theme includes strong portfolio provisions. Best of all, not require any coding knowledge.

Drubo has some interesting animation effects, breadcrumbs customization and tricks up its sleeve, making it the best agency or company theme. Drubo is a top-notch solution for creating your agency’s or company’s website.

Page Builder Features

<strong>Easy Customization</strong>
<p>Almost every easy-to-use element has multi-options to control how they look on the frontend.</p>
<strong>Save Time & Money</strong>
<p>Get the job done faster - no need to purchase extra extensions to customize. Just download and use!</p>
<strong>Without Hand Coding</strong>
<p>You don't need to be a coder to build beautiful pages. Just drag-n-drop elements to create your ideas.</p>
<strong>Increase your Client Satisfaction Today</strong>
<p>For theme authors, business owners, freelancer coders and freelance designers
Elementor Page Builder makes it easier than ever to build beautiful pages within Wordpress</p>

Included With Elementor Page Builder

  • Fonts manager

    Access 850+ Google Fonts with live preview from any where, to build beautiful content.


  • 1500+ icons

    Access hundreds of icons from 3 icon libraries to make your Websites more attractive.


  • Online template library

    40+ online templates for any type of Website. Give your clients more options for their page designs.


  • Float settings popup

    A floating settings panel gives you more design space to better see what you’re working.


  • Prebuilt system

    Easily add sample data to your theme. Your clients can add pages into their site with just a click.


  • CSS system with responsive design

    CSS SYSTEM WITH RESPONSIVE DESIGNEasily change options for every element to create a unique look on any device.


  • Pre-render content

    Content is stored in a database so page content is available even if the Elementor Page Builder is disabled.


  • Copy & paste

    Speed up your projects by copying elements/rows from page to page, even between browser tabs.

Plugins Support

  • Elementor Page Builder
  • Multi language: WPML, Loco, Polylang
  • SEO: Yoast SEO, All in SEO, Google Analytics
  • Speed Optimization: W3 Total Cache, WP Fastest Cache, WP Super Cache
  • Security: iThemes Security (formerly Better WP Security)
  • Forum: bbPress
  • Discussion / Community: BuddyPress
  • Contact: Contact Forms 7 (Included)
  • MailChimp: Easy Forms for MailChimp
  • Spam/malicious Content Protection: Akismet

items.name: JustGive - Charity & Fundraising WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: The 2018 theme for WordPress is a fully responsive theme that looks great on any device. Features include a front page template with its own widgets, an optional display font, styling for post formats on both index and single views, and an optional no-sidebar page template. Make it yours with a custom menu, header image, and background.

items.description:
JustGive is a WordPress theme perfect for Charities, Causes and Fundraising. Packed full of features and pre-built pages, hit the ground running with your next Charity website by choosing Causes. We’ve included several custom shortcodes which gives you the flexibility to design your own pages with added customisability. It has a fully designed WooCommerce store with quick and easy checkout process. It also has events pages for those who want to set up fundraising events and offer tickets for a price, or free!

Theme Features

  • Responsive – This theme is responsive to give a perfect user experience on all devices
  • Boxed or fullwidth layout – This can be set globally or even per page!

items.name: Craftory - Directory Listing Job Board WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Directory Listing Job Board WordPress Theme

items.description:
Our latest top notch classified ads WordPress theme Lisfinity

Craftory – Craftsmen Directory Listing & Job Board WordPress Theme is the most complete and thoroughly made solution for handyman, tradespeople, craftsmen or contractors web businesses. It is highly optimized for fast performance, easy search and simple but eye-catch navigation.

The most important thing that we thought of during the creation of the Craftory WordPress theme was the speed of the site because of the big number of providers and clients it might have and that will complement the beautiful eye-catching design this theme has to offer. So current page load speed is 3.2s with a score of 88 which is a great achievement for this kind of website.

Modern design and lightspeed fast, together, are the perfect ground for extensive, nonintrusive functionality that our theme comes with. Registering providers or clients in few clicks, either from the frontend or backend, and an automatic review system of already registered providers was never simpler. Behind that you’ll be able to use custom-made users clicks analytics, that can be accessed at any time and that will provide you with necessary insight on each provider or job.

Payments included with the Craftory theme should be more than enough to have the whole world covered. No matter the country or region you may want to cover, with this theme you’ll be able to. There is more to come but for now, payments supported are:

  • PayPal
  • Stripe
  • PayU India
  • Bank Transfer
Your users will be able to take advantage of user-friendly made categories & locations, accompanied by advanced ajax search. Whether they come from mobile phones, tablets, or desktops getting right at their desired provider or job will be a matter of seconds.

Top SEO performance will allow you to spread the word to new users with ease. The theme is, besides our thoughtful use of HTML tags and rules, also compatible Yoast SEO plugin. All of which will help your site better SEO and Google indexing.

Modern design and full responsiveness of the theme allow you to easily gain new users no matter the platform they access the site from. Buying our theme, also means that you will be able to create unlimited homepage templates, create unlimited color variations, choose between more than 600 google fonts and take advantage of extensive theme options.

Craftory theme is built using the latest Bootstrap & Sass preprocessor, and with little knowledge of it, you’ll be able to really personalize the site to complete suit your business. If you encounter any issue or possible bug, have no worries. Craftory theme comes with extensive help file & dedicated support team. If you are satisfied with our theme and support please rate and follow!

Functionality Features:
  • Easy provider and job management
  • 4 different payment methods
  • Frontend provider or client registration
  • Craftsman registration
  • Advanced ajax search
  • Highly optimized site
  • Demo content included
  • Compatible with Yoast SEO plugin
  • Social networking
  • Custom homepage banner
  • Custom homepage video banner
  • Custom homepage template ready
  • Pricing packages
  • Custom shortcodes
  • Custom widgets
  • Design Features
  • Modern design
  • Fully responsive
  • RTL supported
  • Cyrillic supported
  • Arabic supported
  • Create unlimited homepage templates
  • Single product multiple page variations
  • Product grid & list styles
  • Extensive theme options
  • Unlimited colors
  • 600+ google fonts
  • Built by bootstrap & sass
  • Child theme included
  • And more…
Monetize – Make profit! Use the site to stand out, be fast, reliable & visible. Finally, earn from an online presence.

Responsive – Be reachable from every device Whatever devices your visitors are using they will not have any problems fully enjoying website content in all its glory.

Bullet-proof & lightning-fast! – Two things that you and your customers can always rely upon. Craftory is a fast and safe enjoyable ride for everyone.

Premium Design – Stand out from the crowd! Nothing can make you prouder and attract more customers than beautifully crafted premium design.

Shortcodes – Edit content! The theme’s ease of use has become even easier with smart integration of various shortcodes. Content editing comes down to selecting the one you wish to use and that’s it!

Beautiful Page Templates – No matter your customers need explanation, guide or some legal advice Craftory offer trough custom crafted & unique templates way to find desired content fast!

Smart Search – Search at will! Bothered by constant clicking and scrolling in searching for the right product? Just enter the city, region, or city district, a category in the main search bar, and in seconds you’ll be right on desired provider or job.

Slider – One slider for one category! You can create as many sliders as you wish and connect every one of them with a different category.

Registering Craftsman & Clients – From back-end! Back-end Craftsman & Clients registration, manipulation & analytics are at your service. Create new stores, edit old ones and track how each of them is performing.

Front-End Craftsman & Jobs Registration – From front-end! Simple to use a form with the fully explained working system will allow your partners to connect, grow & monetize along with your business.

Price Packages – Unlimited price package options. Make it easier for your customers and create as many custom price packages as you want

Payments – Pay from anywhere! Cover the world with fully integrated payment systems. PayPal, Stripe, PayU-India & Bank Transfer

SEO Optimized with YOAST – Be visible! Take advantage of google indexing with advanced SEO optimization and YOAST wp plugin.

Translate Ready – Ready for translation with .po & .mo files. Localize your site by making it multilingual

Social Networking – Promote your site using fully integrated social networking system.

Extensive Help Documentation – Extensive documentation is at your disposal for any question or dilemma you might have. Everything, from setting up to fully running your site has been covered with over 100 PDF pages.

One Click Demo – You like how we made it look? You are just one click away from making it look exactly the same as our demo.

Dedicated Support – Have any questions and inquiries? Reach us on our dedicated support forum and our team will help you with that.

Unlimited Home Pages – Want something different? something more personalized? You can create unlimited home pages with templates. Make it look exactly how you imagine!

Child Theme – Preserve your changes. The child theme is included and you should have no worries will something be overripened after the version upgrade.

Bulletproof Code Bootstrap & SASS – Built by use of Bootstrap & SASS modern technologies.

Directory Listing Job Boards

Craftory is a dedicated directory style listing website, you know like Craigslist, Airbnb or AirTasker, RatedPeople, WerkSpot, kind of deal where everyday people can upload a task they can do – or a service they can provide – and get paid for doing what they love. Everybody wins! Craftory is complete with user profiles for Clients (users) and Craftsman (providers), notifications and messaging that allows providers and users the ability to discuss and manage jobs, as well as a Ratings and Testimonials system and so much more…

Powerful Search with Ajax

With significant time invested into researching the needs of handymen and woman around the world and the types of marketplaces available for people using this freelance gig economy today, we found that Search forms a large part of a user’s needs, the backbone for both providers and users looking for work, or work to do, which is why Search became a top priority for the development of Craftory. By using the power of Ajax we enabled Craftory to provide a deep, comprehensive, and fast Search engine so that everyone can dive into the deep end and find what they need – fast, without timely page reloads. Ajax Live Search means you can see search results while you type and continue to narrow down as you type. It’s fast, funky, and intuitive to use.

Perfect for Handyman/Craftsmen/Contractors, AirTasker Style

Craftory has primarily been developed {Like a Boss} as a full job board-style system – allowing tradespeople and job providers to create comprehensive profiles, request job applications, apply for jobs listed and manage the entire process end to end. It can also be used exclusively as a directory style listing by removing job functionality, which would make an excellent listing/affiliate/marketing and SEO style website.

Rating System Integration

The success of these freelance style websites with users engaging directly with the providers relies heavily on user-generated ratings. It’s crucial that service providers and tradespeople have a way of getting feedback, with Craftory has a complete Review and Rating systems integrated with the backend and frontend of this WordPress theme. The Review system is for both Craftsman and Clients and as admin, you have the ability to remind both types of users to leave a review and rating for each job completed.

Generate Revenue

The ‘gig economy’ is powering people to change the way we think about employment, freelancing, working from home, remote working – it’s the new employment model and exactly why Craftory was created. You can generate revenue via memberships for your own family by helping others also create work for themselves, once it’s all set up and running, it almost takes care of itself.

Dedicated Ad Space

Once you have got your new website up and running, everyone will want a piece of that action and you can step it up a level by charging for Premium Ad Spaces. We recognized that need quickly and have provided carefully crafted dedicated Ad Spaces throughout Craftory to keep it really professional and make it easy to manage. Google AdSense is one example of mainstream advertising that is easy to set up and starts earning passive income quickly. Throughout Craftory there are several dedicated spaces that you can quickly and easily add your AdSense code too and your new ads will display beautifully on the screen, regardless of device type and size. Simple.

Comprehensive Profile Pages for Providers

Every Craftsman gets to create what we think of as a ‘mini-site’ to promote their craft. It includes a place for your personal info, a dedicated review section, expertise, hours of business, and a personal website if they have one. The site assigns an overall rating to Craftory, gives you a dedicated space for social media links, and includes geolocation mapping for ease of use with directions. Of course, it is all meticulously designed to look incredibly professional so that your tradespeople put their best foot forward, and being optimized for Google means it is great for SEO too.

Premium Administration Panel

Craftory utilizes the already familiar WordPress backend but extends it with new Menu Items to help you manage all of the functionality required by an admin. When a new member joins you can see their details, update anything, grant different levels of access, promote them as a Featured User or allocate Premium Status as well as monitor their open and closed jobs.

eCommerce Integration

Monetization is clearly an important part of Craftory and this includes the ability to grant different levels of membership including Paid and Free or Trial accounts to users. The membership area allows you to grant specific time allocations as well as trial job limits to the different levels of memberships, as well as payment amounts, etc. To make it easy for users most common forms of payment have been integrated as well – no stone has been left unturned. Users can use PayPal, Stripe, PayU India, or Bank Transfer. This gives everyone the access to work autonomously making your new website perfect for a brand new passive income stream – huzzah!

Promotions

Craftory also includes a dedicated section for you to include promotions for different craftsmen. Really engage with your users and run specific promotions or offer seasonal specials to clients – the marketing potential is all built-in, right out of the box and no coding required. Feature List:
  • Directory Listings
  • Responsive Design
  • Job Boards
  • Profile Pages
  • Working Map Area
  • Profile Video
  • Profile Images
  • Profile Categories
  • Profile Map Directions
  • Kozmo Administration Dashboard
  • Front End & Backend Administration submissions
  • Premium Administration backend
  • Google Adsense predicted spaces
  • Video Background Homepage Template
  • Rating System
  • Feature Listing System
  • Subscriptions
  • Free Trial Capability
  • Translate ready with .po and .mo
  • Craftsman Area of services (draw shape over map)
  • Opening hours
  • Geolocation
  • Ajax Search
  • Speed rated 3.6 by GT Metrix
  • Google Maps integration
  • Memberships for Providers and Users
  • Full RTL Support
  • Admin Remind rating
  • PayPal, Bank Transfer, PayU India, Stripe
  • Google fonts
  • Material design icons
  • Cosmo premium administration panel
  • WooCommerce
  • Cyrillic Support
  • Much more…

Frequently asked questions about Craftory WP Theme

Can this be onlu Directory Listing theme, without Job Board. Yes, of course, you can choose that. All functionality is plugin based so you can simply disconnect Job Board plugin.

What for is Craftory? Craftory WordPress theme is a premium directory listing website for creating job boards, selling services, providing services with user memberships, responsive design and much more…

Check all FAQ here

items.description:
Sahajjo – Charity WordPress Theme is a charity and fundraising WordPress theme, which includes several advanced options for the fundraising niche. It is carefully tailored for businesses related to charity, non-profit and general fundraising. Based on Bootstrap infrastructure. The sleek, intuitive, and stylish design is especially for charity, child care, orphan, lorn etc. Sahajjo is a creative, inherently flexible theme with graphical customization, layout configuration, color scheme alteration and stunning drag & drop builder, no coding and high quality image.

Sahajjo – Charity / Fundraising Nonprofit WordPress Theme provides 2 unique Home versions with preset page layouts. It has bloated features list, header & footer setting, service setting, custom style Google Map setting, and other options like menu, logo, blog, pagination & so on. Drag and Drop page builder with multi-options is available for clients’ high satisfaction. Get extra extensions of easy-to-use element and you will be all set. You don’t need any coding skills with Sahajjo WordPress Theme! Using King Composer, one of the best Page Builders around, customization flows in a smooth motion. Supported by numerous plugins like WPML, Yoast SEO, iThemes & Wordfence Security, bbPress, BuddyPress, Contact Form 7, and Mailchimp. The goal of this theme is to provide an effortless platform for raising donations. With Sahajjo, you can display projects, causes, and event in the best possible way! Build your website without any hassle with this SEO-friendly theme.

Donation collection needs to be spontaneous. Accept online donations, charitable gifts through customizable donation forms with Give- Donation Plugin. PayPal Donations let you setup PayPal ID and few other optional settings. Avail directory entry for your courteous donators through PayPal quick link. You can appear a PayPal Donation Button which will lead to a payment page of currency, localization, payment method. Accept Credit Cards and Master Cards facilities on your website.

items.description:
Amita – Music Band WordPress Theme

Amita, Music Band WordPress Theme is specially designed for music, band, artist, music industry, fanclub website or other companies in niches.

Highlight Features:

  • Full solution for Amita, Music Band site. No empty link, no broken link.
  • Modern style of About, Music, Media .v.v.
  • Music Press Pro Plugin compatible
  • Clean, modern, multi-purpose design can be used for any type of website.
  • WordPress 4 Tested and Approved.
  • Built with HTML5 and CSS3.
  • SEO Optimized ( also compatible with SEO Plugins ) Well organized, commented & clean code.
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, IE9 ~ IE11.
  • 100% Responsive Theme.
  • Comes with the Visual Composer, most awesome visual page builder for WordPress.
  • 1-6 Column Support.
  • 2 Theme Versions: Dark version & Light version.
  • Awesome CSS3 animations for every modules.
  • Child Theme Compatible – includes basic child theme.
  • Strong focus on design and typography, usability and overall user-experience.
  • JQuery Enhancements.
  • Includes Icons Fonts, more than 600 retina ready icons included!
Advanced Customization / Themes Options
  • Customize Every part of the website using the Styling options.
  • Unlimited Colors options, you can customize your website to match your colors.
  • Easily change Font and Font size.
  • Advanced options to enable/disable individual features.
Amita & Visual Composer
  • Amita include the Visual Composer, Currently the most famous WordPress page builder.
  • We made 17 Modules for the Visual Page builder, you will be able to customize anything you want super easily, never code.
  • Change style ( design ) and color of any modules super easily.
  • Easily create stunning pages using our awesome modules.
  • All you see on our demo is built only with the Visual Composer modules.
Music Press Pro Plugin
  • Easily Add & Customize Songs.
  • Easily Add & Customize Albums.
  • Easily Add & Customize Artists.
  • Easily Add & Customize Bands.
  • Easily Add & Customize Genres.
Popular Plugin Compatible
  • Music Press Pro Ready.
  • The Events Calendar ready with full design integration.
  • Slider Revolution with full design integration.
  • Visual Composer Ready.
  • Tz Plus Gallery Ready.
  • WPML plugin support.
  • WordPress Social Login support.
  • WooCommerce support.

Unlimited Color Options

  • Extremely detailed styling tab in theme options.
  • Unlimited Color Options / Skins with backend and front end Color Picker.
  • Full Color Customizations – change every element with ease including all Visual Composer Modules.

Advanced Blog Options

  • Set up left or right sidebar or be full width.
  • 6 post types ( video, audio, gallery, link, standard, quote ).
  • Set up multiple blog pages and set custom categories per page using blog module.
  • Auto generated thumbnails.
  • Post sharing with social icons.
  • Threaded Comments.
  • Tons of options to add remove data, excerpt, related post etc.

WooCommerce compatible

  • Plugin ready with full design integration.
  • Options for 2 to 4 Columns.
  • Custom Visual Composer Modules to display your products.
  • Custom layout for your shop pages.
  • Custom design for single product pages.
  • Display products based on category, SKU, sale, featured, newest etc.
  • WooCommerce shortcodes are included in the visual composer.
Advanced Typography Options
  • Use Google Fonts or Standard fonts.
  • All font options are controlled in the theme options panel.
  • Set different font sizes for all fonts, H1-H6 headings, body, footer, header, dropdown etc.
  • Set different colors for all fonts.
  • Set font-size, line-height, font-weight for each font type as well.

items.name: Eikra - Education WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Eikra is a clean and modern theme for all kinds of Education and Learning Institute.

items.description:
Eikra – Education WordPress Theme with Learning Management System (LMS)

Eikra is a minimal and contemporary WordPress theme that has been perfectly crafted for education centres of all kinds. Designed with your School, College, University or Training Center in mind, this ultimate education WordPress theme includes everything you need for a complete online education centre and LMS.

Eikra uses LearnPress, the most popular WordPress LMS plugin because it’s packed full of great features for your education centre, online courses or tutorial website, but it’s also super easy to use. With LearnPress LMS, you can include your curriculum, courses, lessons, quizzes, payment integration, and loads more…

This comprehensive education WordPress theme includes 12 single and multi-page home page demos, with clean and modern layouts that make it easy for users to navigate through your educational content. With one-click demo import and the Visual Composer drag and drop page builder, you can get started in seconds and create a powerful online learning centre before your eyes.

So much more than just a school website or course directory, Eikra transforms your educational website into a fully functioning academic hub, with a dynamic learning community. You can include instructor profile pages, with multiple elegant layouts, as well as feedback and reviews. Event and blog pages help to keep your academic community engaged and active, and there are tons of pre-built custom addons to suit your individual needs. This ultimate education WordPress theme is also WooCommerce ready, so you can create your own online store and take secure payments for course enrolments, subscriptions, resources or merchandise.

Fully responsive and mobile-friendly, Eikra ensures that your school or college website, virtual education centre or LMS is always on hand. Your users, students, teachers, instructors, course leaders and admin can check-in, keep up to date, communicate, learn and even submit work on the go!

Whatever your educational institution, this complete education WordPress theme with LMS is everything you need – and more! – to create a fully customized, powerful and thriving online learning hub. To make sure that you’re getting the most out of Eikra, we offer real-time online support, 15 hours a day. Whatever your question or problem, you’ll get a fast response and a helping hand!

Eikra Features:

  • 7 Home Pages (Multi Pages).
  • 7 Home Pages (One Pages).
  • 7 inner Header Styles can do 20+ header variations.
  • 3 Instructor Layouts.
  • 2 Testimonial Layouts
  • 3 Course Layouts
  • 2 Event Layouts
  • 3 Research Layouts
  • RTL Supported
  • Drag & Drop Page Builder included -WP Bakery Page Builder ($45)
  • Drag & Drop Page Builder -Elementor
  • Powerful Premium Slider included – Layer Slider ($22)
  • Responsive & Mobile Friendly.
  • SEO Friendly
  • Unlimited Color Combinations.
  • Customizer Included so you can change real time of theme option
  • Powerful Admin Panel by Redux.
  • Dynamic Page Header
  • Clean, Trending and Modern Design.
  • Free Lifetime updates!
  • One Click Demo Importer.
  • Child Theme Included.
  • Supports all modern browsers Chrome, Safari, Firefox, IE11+.
  • WPML Translation Supported ( also pot file included)
  • Quick & Faster Support (12 hrs online in a day)
  • Google Web Font
  • Detail Documentation Included.

ICONS:

  • Font Awesome Icon – Font-Awesome
  • Flat Icon – Flaticon.com

IMAGES:

Unsplash.com

Note: Premium images are not included, only use for demo purposes.

FONTS:

  • Roboto – https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto

Faqs

Can I use this Theme as non LMS? Ans: Yes, You can use as non LMS just don’t install “LearnPress” Plugin then for Course & Instructor custom post type will be enable.

items.name: Palazzo - Real Estate WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Palazzo is the Real Estate WordPress theme with super versatile content blocks, drag and drop page builder and exclusive magazine features: Tabbed Mega Menu, Dropdown Top Pin Board, Subscription Plan, Bookmark Post,.. and much more

items.description:
Latest Version 1.2.2 – April 10, 2020 – view changelog
WordPress 5.4 Ready
WPBakery Page Builder 6.x Ready
WooCommerce 4.x Ready
P/s: please backup your site first before to updated this version.

Palazzo, Beyond Functional Real Estate Theme, is our effort for new and great user experience in building up a real estate site. The theme is not only a theme for real estate business but also a great solution for all related real estate terms. We take care of all needs that real estate agents, agencies and companies wish them being available in. Also, with easy-to-use front-end and powerful backend features the theme will engage to more users.

Being in detail, Palazzo comes with the four smashing homepages with reasonable structures and a cool look insight. Plus, Advanced search gives users full of details that be needed for a specific property and also get a strong impression with comprehensive single property page in various style. Last but not least, Agency list we add will give a convenient way for companies to manage their real estate sites as well as all agents who work for them.

Palazzo goes beyond basic real estate theme with these core features below!

Bing Map Integration

Palazzo has launched a new version with the integration of FREE open source Bing Map which allows users to search their cared property in an exact radius basing on their current location.

Incredibly Improving Front-end Management

Concerning frontend management, users take an opportunity in experiencing new features on the Front-end that are exactly comfortable! Users easily submit a property, manage their profile, save their favorite properties by some simple clicks on the front-end.

In-depth Single Property

The more information of properties are shown, the more understanding customers have about the theme and basing on to choose the best fit. You can find all the essential information as property statistics, ratings, walk scores, video and so on.

One-click Installation & Theme Options

Quickly install the demos with one-click installation and have fun in customization the theme with Theme Options. Furthermore, Palazzo gives you more options in submitting property by offering these two options (For Sale/ For Buy). Also, you can get more options in choosing pricing package and header & footer layouts.

9+ Powerful Home Demos

Palazzo allows users to quickly create high-performance real estate sites with distinguished functional homepage demos. The real estate theme comes with the 9 smashing homepages with reasonable structure and a cool look insight.

Multiple Types of Searching

Searching is one of the most caring of realtors when developing a powerful real estate site. They wish to find the expected properties quickly and exactly and Palazzo meets the need. Currently, you can find three types of searching including live search, search map, and advanced search.

Different Properties Listing

Palazzo helps you show the nicest way of properties listing with a various property listing layouts as you wish. Following the target of selling properties at best, Palazzo helps realtors, agencies, and agents display their properties beautifully.

Agent & Agency Pages

Palazzo deserves users the informative agent’s page (Agent listing and agent details) and new experience on Agency listing and agency details (New) Users now conveniently set up and manage an agency with Palazzo thanks to offering smart agency pages including agency list, agency details with various layouts. Now, users get more comfortable in building up and managing all agency pages.

Palazzo Theme – Full Features List:

  • One Click Installation
    • Only a click to get all the demo content visible on your site.
  • Auto Update The Theme & Plugins
    • No more wasting your time updating theme and plugins manually. The theme can be easily updated automatically with just one click.
  • Live Theme Customizer
    • With Palazzo, you get to choose the color scheme of your site, ensuring that the aesthetics will match your vision.
  • Fully responsive and retina ready
    • Palazzo is optimized for any screen resolution and it looks fantastic on phones, tablets and PCs
  • Extensive Homepages
    • As an endless inspiration, Palazzo satisfies all your needs as you wish with distinguished functional homes.
  • 4 Custom Post Types
    • Properties: You can add as many properties as you want in admin panel or frontend submission. Agents: Add and manage agents’ information easily with just a few steps. Gallery: Palazzo’s gallery is displayed beautifully with the UI-focused layout. Testimonial: Input testimonials and get them displayed on any pages using testimonial shortcode
  • Advanced Search
    • Help your visitors search for the appropriate property to meet their needs by multiple search criteria like property status, types, location, price range and more.
  • Live Property Search
    • Palazzo helps you save lots of time by live property search feature. It shows search results right after you choose the criteria, no need to click on Search Property button.
  • Frontend Submission
    • Exclusive: Easily customize Property’s icon and color on map
  • Floor Plans
    • Palazzo displays floor plans beautifully to make your visitors have the best impression on your properties.
  • Favorite Properties
    • Interested in a property? Just click on the heart button on the bottom of that property, then it will appear in your “My favorites” section on your dashboard/profile.
  • Properties Compare
    • Easily compare between two or even several properties by clicking on “Compare” button.
  • AJAX reviews and ratings
    • It helps your visitors to comment and rate the property effortlessly by AJAX.
  • Unlimited numbers of Custom Fields, Features & Amentities
    • Palazzo allows your visitors to smoothly add, edit and delete unlimited numbers of Custom Fields, Features & Amenities to be displayed in property details.
  • Advanced Search Options Panel
    • Default Search options can be simply customized in flexible backend settings panel
  • Membership Packages/ Pricing Table
    • Palazzo allows you to create as many membership packages as you want. You can also change package flexibly.
  • Fully detailed Agent Dashboard
    • Palazzo has distinct dashboard to let your users add, edit, delete or set featured property quickly and efficiently.
  • Agent Profile
    • Your visitors or agents will have their own profiles on Profile page in which they can easily manage their information.
  • dsIDXpress IDX Plugin & Optima Express IDX Plugin Compatible
    • We make sure that your MLS listing display appealingly in our theme. Palazzo is dsIDXpress and Optima Express ready. Integrating IDX plugin in your website enables you to update automatically the listings in your website, get enhanced search functionality and generate more leads. Note that the plugins are supported, not included, please download them at www.dsidxpress.com and wordpress.org/plugins/optima-express
  • WooCommerce compatible
    • Palazzo has style WooCommerce pages and elements. You can bring your business online and sell things right away with Palazzo.
  • Mega Menu
    • Palazzo included Mega Menu plugin to enhance the navigation and usability of your website.
  • Unlimited colors and Google Font
    • Set the color for an appropriate element with different color schemes. You can change the colors without any extra effort
  • SEO Friendly
    • Strong search engine optimization enhancements have been implemented from the codebase up within Palazzo, ensuring you get the traffic you need to kick off your real estate website.
  • Right to Left Supported
    • Palazzo supports right to left languages and repositions elements when necessary.
  • Slider Revolution Included (Save $19)
    • It also includes powerful Revolution Slider Plugin that enables you to showcase all the latest or featured properties with property name, price and detail information.
  • WPBakery Page Builder Included (Save $34)
    • Setting up and organizing your site is made easy with its built-in WPBakery Page Builder, a premium drag & drop builder plugin that allows you to generate unlimited pages in a flash.
  • Translation Ready
    • Palazzo supports multilingual translation using WPML.
  • Regular Update
    • We keep updating the theme regularly with more addon features and minor bug fixed. Just one time payment, you will get the update lifetime for free.
  • Translation Ready
    • Palazzo supports multilingual translation using WPML.
  • Comprehensive Documentation
    • We included in theme package dedicated document file to guide you step by step installing and customizing the theme.
  • Whole-hearted support
    • In addition to dedicated documentation, the senior developers of Palazzo will support you. We are happy to support you to build your amazing website.
  • And much more

Support

All support is handled by our Forum.We encourage you to post all your questions concerning to our template there as your questions may have already been answered or may be of help to other people that have also purchased the template.

Keep In Touch With Us

Keep updated with our latest news and release by subscribing to our newsletter at Blog NooTheme or follow us via social networks.

items.name: Karibu - Single Property Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Single Property Theme for Real Estate Agents and Property Owners

items.description:
Karibu has been built from the ground up by an experienced team of designers and developers who carefully researched the needs of business websites, in particular in construction and real estate industries resulting in a finely tuned theme that is state-of-the-art, quality coding, user friendly and visually stunning.

Whether you’re renting or selling a property, Karibu is the perfect WordPress theme for your real estate needs.

Welcome to Karibu.

Powerful Admin Panel

With a built-in Admin Panel behind the scenes accessing all the control and power of features in Karibu is simple and familiar. Log-in to your WP backend and you will find a new Navigation Item in the Left Hand panel.

One click and you can start to see just how simple this makes updating your new website. Most elements are quickly accessible and your can preview your changes on the fly. Update your Typography in a few simple clicks, update your Header image and control the way users navigate. It’s simple to use, powerful and you don’t need to code a thing.

Different Demos – One Click Install

With two carefully constructed complete demos at your fingertips, and more to come, Karibu continues to grow with new demos being added with new updates, you’re bound to find something you’re going to love.

While we have a solid focus on the real estate and construction industries, Karibus can also be easily modified to meet many different business needs.

Different Header Layouts

Creative header layouts can be the difference between bland or an amazing user experience. It’s the first place a visitor is going to look, so it needs to be appealing and enable them to operate your website easily.

With Karibu you have flexibility to create a header layout with character and flexibility. Create a stronger brand awareness with your business logo in a sticky header, build a friendlier experience with a full width image, or keep it simple with a well place tagline and your logo.

Different Post Types

With our built-in Post Types you can create stunning layouts to highlight custom content, promote projects or advertise your services to prospective clients. With Karibu’s range of different post types, you’ll be on a fast track to stunning content in a flash.

Bundled Plugins

Taking your web build to the next level using Karibu and the #1 Drag & Drop Page Builder – Visual Composer + Slider Revolution, both bundled with your purchase.

Create almost any web element you desire with the Drag & Drop simplicity of the #1 Best Selling Page Builder Plugin for WordPress – Visual Composer. It’s intuitive and almost limitless when it comes to creating unique web pages and reusable elements.

Slider Revolution – as they say, it’s not just a Slider Plugin, it’s a new way to deliver ideas.

This couldn’t be more true as you create beautiful content in a creative way – whether it’s a Slider, Carousel, Hero Scene or full page, with this powerhouse plugin Slider Revolution has you covered.

Responsive, Modern Design

Of course Karibu has been carefully created to scale beautifully across all of today’s modern devices leaving you with nothing to do but get creative.

With the responsive framework of Karibu our content is going to look like it was designed for the device it is being viewed on, tablets, laptops, smartphones…

Translation Ready

A well structured website will have to cope with multilingual visitors and you will need to be prepared for that.

Theme Features

  • Translation Ready
  • Online Documentation
  • Great Customer Support
  • Responsive Mortgage Calculator Ready
  • Contact Form 7 Ready
  • Drag’n’drop page builder – Visual Composer
  • Slider Revolution
  • One-click demo import

Rishad is a App Landing Responsive WordPress Theme build on Bootstrap grid. wordpress_theme_metadata.description: The 2017 theme for WordPress is a fully responsive theme that looks great on any device. Features include a front page template with its own widgets, an optional display font, styling for post formats on both index and single views, and an optional no-sidebar page template. Make it yours with a custom menu, header image, and background.

items.description:
Menticare – Psychologist is an elegant premium WordPress Theme for a practical psycologist, therapy centre, marriage counseling, family therapy, individual counselor or therapist.

This theme is going to become a perfect platform for a professional website. High quality services realted to personality, its problems and personal growth strategies have always been appreciated and there is no better way to tell people about your services.

This WordPress Theme is powered by Redux FrameWork and has a perfectly formatted and commented code. It’s going to be super easy-to-customize. You can literally adjust everything to give your website a personal touch. Home page of the template is a perfect place to tell your audience more about you and your services. And the blog page is a great way to share your stories and thoughts, that way keeping your audience up to date with your latest news.

The WordPress Theme has tons of widgets and shortcodes, and has multiple otpions for headers, footers, breadcrumbs copyrights and side menus. Features free fonts from Google Fonts Library and FontAwesome icons.

WordPress Theme is a compelling tool for promoting and marketing your business, especially when it comes to specialists providing psychological services. And to achieve success in this sphere you need to use all the means possible, so why not start with a professionally crafted website?

By the way, our support team is always ready to consult in case any help needed!

Use Visual Builder to create your own unique pages!

Visual Builder

You can now use Visual Builder to create singlepage or multipage websites with no coding!

Main Visual Builder features:

  • Drag’n’drop layout building and editing.
  • Easy to create multipage and single page sites.
  • Creating other pages based on existing saved page.
  • Inline content editing.
  • Easy-to-edit and customize predefined building blocks.
  • Highlighted HTML source code editing.
  • Project import and export.
  • Drag’n’drop images upload.
  • Easy page preview.
  • Generating HTML files into your siteroot directory.
  • Creating ZIP archive with all files needed for uploading onto production server.
  • Webserver is not necessary.

Please NOTE: Visual Builder is not actual WordPress editor. It also cannot modify existing WP pages. Its main purpose is creating new pages with predefined building blocks.

Theme Features

  • 120+ Predefined WordPress pages
  • Various Headers, Footers etc.
  • Side (Left and Right) Menu
  • Mega Menu
  • Bootstrap 3 based
  • Fully Responsive
  • 3 Predefined Color Schemes
  • Animate everything you want
  • Parallax Sections
  • Tons of shortcodes
  • Light & Dark Versions
  • Boxed & Wide Versions
  • Extremely Customizable
  • Free Fonts and icons
  • Working PHP Scripts and Widgets included:
    • Instagram Widget
    • Flickr Widget
    • MailChimp Subscribe Form
    • Twitter Widget
    • Contact Form
    • Search
  • Clean and Valid Code
  • And much more

What You Get

  • WordPress Theme, CSS, JS & PHP files
  • All demo Files
  • Free Icon Fonts
  • Good documentation

Credits and Sources

We used Twitter Bootstrap v3 as CSS framework for this template.

items.name: Onero | Creative Portfolio Theme for Professionals

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Onero is a multi-purpose WordPress theme. Onero Themes are simple and powerful. Create awesome portfolio, corporate, business and much much more pages with this theme.

items.description:
Who is it for?

Portfolio, Photographer , Designer , Freelancer , Architects , Online Store or anyone else who want to showcase their works in a creative and beautiful way, Onero is the theme you have been waiting for. Get a copy now and start creating that amazing website!

Who is it for?

Portfolio, Photographer , Designer , Freelancer , Architects , Online Store or anyone else who want to showcase their works in a creative and beautiful way, Onero is the theme you have been waiting for. Get a copy now and start creating that amazing website!

Some Features

-Setup Wizard

Onero websites can be created with 3 simple click with an innovative installation setup wizard system. Setup Wizard can install dummy data and the required plugins automatically. After the installation is finished you have only to edit the content. No more problems with demo installations. You can select from infinite number of demos to install automatically without wasting your time anymore

-Customizability Theme Options

We are proud of the customizability of Onero WordPress Theme. Like its name the theme is very easily to install and configure, also you will enjoy work with live customizer. Any customization can be made from WordPress native “Customizer” so you preview all the changes you made without need to refresh the page or change browser.

Onero comes with this advanced and full option panel but very intuitive and friendly. You can change any part of theme styling without writing a line of code. You can check also how responsive is your website directly from the live preview.

-Page Builder

We use the modified version of the most popular and maintained page builder on the market Visual Composer by wpbakery. We have created our customized elements and added new options and features. So you can build any website with drag and drop in front-end with live preview or in the back-end.

Some of our extra elements added: Heading Styles

Rows and Columns comes with different new options and features to extend the Visual Composer functionalities.

- Extensions

We have build in-house plugins to make the theme works perfectly without incompatibilities. So our library of plugins will extend in time. Also we have included with the theme for free the most popular premium plugins so you don’t have to spend a dime to use them. Our in house developed plugin are: Elle Custom Post Type, Staff Post Type, Testimonial Post Type, Faq Post Type that can be used to create the respective elements.

Elle Shortcodes

List of shortcodes that can be used on posts and pages with some customization options. Elle Post Likes

Plugin created for adding post likes in post blogs and portfolio.

Elle Slider

This is a simple slider created by our team to help users to create simple and beautiful sliders.

Revolution Slider

Revolution Slider is the most popular premium slider on the market. This slider comes for free included in theme so you don’t need to spend extra money to use it. Worth $19.

WPBakery Visual Composer

The most used and popular drag n drop page builder. Visual Composer is included within Onero for free so you have only to use it. Worth $34.

LayerSlider WP

Is a premium multi-purpose slider for creating image galleries, content sliders, and mind-blowing slideshows with must-see effects, even from your WordPress posts and pages. Comes for free included in the theme. Worth $18

MailChimp List Subscribe Form

SoundCloud Shortcode

User Avatar

WP Retina 2x - Responsive Onero can be accessed and looks perfectly on your PC, iMac, Mac Books, iPhone’s, Smartphones, iPads, any other mobile devices. So now days mobile device accessibility is the most important features for any website. We have created a simple and fully responsive WordPress Theme to be displayed perfectly to any user.

Responsive is important also for your Google Search Engine Ranking.

-28 + Predefined Home Pages

Predefined Home Pages ready to use. You only have to change content and images and your website will be ready.

-60 + Ready Pages

Predefined Page ready to use for your About us, Services, and Presentation Pages, Contact Us, Pricing List, Presentation Pages.

-Improved Performance

Our theme comes with an improved performance and works faster, load faster and smoothly. We have introduced new technology to make that possible. Asynchronous Javascript and Css loading. Minified script also make the theme lighter.

-Navigation

Navigation is important so we give you unlimited variations of it. We have built 12+ plus ready headers that can be customized to create unlimited new header styles. For example you can chose the Left Header Sidebar and begin to customize menu font-size, menu font-family, header background, adding different widgets etc. So you can get a new navigation.

-Mega Menu

Onero theme comes with an Mega Menu built-in so you don’t need to install third party plugin to work with Mega Menus. Our system its fully compatible with WordPress core and easy so you can create Mega Menu in WordPress Menu settings.

-Layout

We create a theme that can change the width of the page as you want. So you can create Boxed Layout Websites, Full Screen Websites, or with the exact width you want.

-WooCommerce

eCommerce today its one of the most profitable businesses, don’t be the last to grab this opportunity. If you have something to sell create any type of shop with The

Simple. You can create from the minimal shop to the most advanced one. WooCommerce its the most used plugin in the internet to create eCommerce plugin. Onero fits perfectly with this plugin. We also have created predefined shop for you ready to use. You can manage every details of the Ecommerce business from Item Presentation to Payments Gateway. No more headaches everything is simple.

items.name: Fona - Responsive Elementor WooCommerce Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Fona is an impressive, super light, flexible and feature rich WordPress WooCommerce Theme for your online shop.

items.description:
Latest Version 3.1.2 Release Feb 21, 2023 Click HERE to view the Changelog
  • Update Cafe Pro to version 1.2.13
  • Update Clever swatches to 2.2.4
  • Update Cleverr Megamenu for elementor pro to 1.0.11
  • Elementor 3.11.1 compatibility
  • WooCommerce 7.4.0 compatibility

Fona is a clean & minimal WooCommerce theme for shopping online stores. With design minimal and focus on products, Fona will make your online store look more impressive and attractive to viewers. With this WooCommerce theme you can use it for a lot of e-commerce website such as fashion store, furniture store, decoration store, etc.

Key Features

1. WooCommerce Compatibility

fona is the perfect theme for your shop or your clients websites as an agency or freelancer.

2. Mobile Optimized Design

Quick and easy to use the most important thing for selling product on mobile. fona is fully responsive and very close to a native app.

3. Powerful Page Builder

Building anything with Drag & Drop page builder and large element library.

4. Drag & Drop Sliders Builder

Create amazing and responsive sliders with never be easier with Revolution Slider and it’s included in fona for free.

5. Clever Mega Menus for Visual Composer included

CleverMegaMenus is an easy to use Mega Menu Plugin For Visual Composer. This WordPress plugin is a user-friendly, highly customizable, responsive Mega Menu.

6. Unlimited Options

Quick setup, customize anything with Live Customizer Options panel. Save tons of times and there’s no coding required

7. One Click Demo Importer

Fully automated One Click Demo Content Importer will recreate our demo website on your server in a minute.

8. Unlimited Header Styles

Working with customers and their specific requirements allows to make different header combinations that will satisfy any user needs.

9. Unlimited Shop Layouts

Shop page is one of the most important elements in your web store. We understand that should give you maximum flexibility in desired layout.

10. Powerful Ajax Shop

CleverLayredNavigation – WooCommerce Ajax Product Filter plugin included: Our built-in AJAX Product Filter functionality gives your customers a seamless user experience on both desktop and mobile devices.

11. Unlimited Product Page Layouts

Conversion rate for your website will depend on product page view. We offer only trusted variants checked by our experience. Choice is on your side.

12. Product Variation Swatches

CleverSwatches – WooCommerce Color or Image Variation Swatches plugin included: Convert your normal variable attribute dropdown select to nicely looking color or image select. CleverSwatches allows you to add multiple gallery images for each variation and when visitor selects the variation those gallery images will be shown as gallery images instead of main product gallery images.

13. Beautiful Shopping Experience

Everything you’re looking for in eCommerce theme and nothing more. Stronger. Faster. Smarter.

14. Catalog Mode

Choose to turn off the eCommerce functionality of the theme, and use WooCommerce for cataloging purposes instead. It can be easily turned on or off from the Customizer, which makes it ideal of you decide to start SELLING online at a later time.

15. Tailored Quick View

Shoppers love to get a good visual sense of the product before purchasing. Provide a beautiful user experience while driving all eyeballs to the products you’re offering.

16. Off-Canvas Shopping Cart

Allow your clients to see the products they’ve selected in a glance, with the possibility to add or remove products without being forced to navigate back and forth across the site.

17. Built-in Live Search

Search products, pages or blog posts instantly

18. Instagram Shop

Sale your products over your Instagram Feed. Add more shoppable links by clicking on your Instagram Feed tab.

19. Blogging in Style

Give your blog and extra oompht! fona comes with 2 beautiful blog layout to help you make your content stand out and grab the internet.

20. PSD Included

PSD version is included when you purchase fona. After purchase just contact us to get the downloadable link.

21. Translate Ready

The theme includes the required .po & .mo files ready for translation. Easily translate using the Codestyling Location plugin, plug support for WPML & qTranslate for multi-language support.

22. SEO Optimized

The Theme is perfect to get brilliant result on Search Engine Ranking. Built in performance options will ensure that your website loads fast and run smoothly. It comes with clean and optimised code. It’s compatible with most of SEO plugins (especially with SEO Yoast Plugin)

23. Reliable Support

We care about our clients very much. Theme includes 100% free premium support. If you have a questions, contact us and we will answer your question shortly and resolve your issue. We are happy to hear from you.

Disclaimer

The photos used in our live preview are not a part of the demo content. All photos can be downloaded from unsplash.com OR purchased from shutterstock.com

items.description:
Carena – Beautifully Designed WordPress Theme for Motor and Automobile businesses.

Carena is the ultimate WordPress theme. It is specially tailored for the car niche, with a lot of features specially designed for the Motor Industry. Carena can be customized to your specific needs with incredible ease, thanks to its powerful Admin Options. It comes with easy to follow documentation and one-to-one awesome support as well.

Unique Car Listing pages

Carena theme comes with well designed and functional car listing pages. Unlike other generic WordPress themes, Carena has auto-sort features without page reload based on Car make, Price, Release date, Year, Mileage, Engine and so on. It also contains features to integrate Videos, Contact forms, and Phone numbers on the Car details page, making it easier for customers to know more about your product and an easy way to contact you. Thus Carena theme can help you convert your visitors into customers.

Very easy to install and setup

The theme comes with auto importer integrated, which imports everything you see on the demo site to your website. Just a click and everything imports flawlessly.

Documentation & Dedicated Support

Our passion is to make you use and love the theme, so we help you with everything related to this theme within hours of your message. You will not be left alone once you purchase, we want you fully satisfied with the purchase. You can check reviews below or from the reviews tab.

Dear Customers :

Meto is a Professional & Clean Financial Blog & Magazine Theme for Investors, Traders and Economists. As a professional investor or trader, you can show your Stock Portfolio and we have graph to demonstrate your Stock Portfolio Income History. This could help your fans know how best and professional you are as a investor or trader.

At ETF Channel you can recommend some ETFs to visitors in order to attract more readers to your Blog or Magazine.

Meto contains 30+ ADs places for your Adsense and Affiliate Ads.

We also flawlessly optimized SEO for Meto : meta tags, perfect page speed, perfect on-page SEO, SEO plugins collection, clean code, responsive design…… We know that SEO is very important for a blog/magazine theme. We hope to skyrocket your rank in Google.

Puca is a flexible and customizable WooCommerce Multi-Store WordPress Theme that installs and changes any item in a matter of minutes via Powerful Theme Options, you can also customize Google fonts. No code is easy and simple.

Puca can be used for a variety of purposes, specially built store for the Fashion, Furniture, Electronics,... Puca is fully compatible with all SEO standards helping your business have a high search on Google Search. Each page of Puca is fully compliant, so it can be viewed easily regardless of different screen devices such as desktops, tablets and mobile phones. All that makes your customers have an enjoyable shopping experience.

The most popular Wordpress plugins on CodeCanyon and the best services are included in theme which price total $234. They will help you save tons of time working on your site.

Puca is a high quality and intelligent design that comes with 350+ different pages that will give you a great choice. You will easily find the best for your purpose without spending too much time.

items.name: Halena | Minimal & Modern eCommerce WordPress Theme

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Minimal & Modern eCommerce WordPress Theme.

items.description:
Welcome to the most complete eCommerce WordPress theme! Halena is modern and minimal, but with all the advanced features you need to give your users a seamless shopping experience from start to finish. Perfect for feature-rich and user-friendly eCommerce websites of all kinds, Halena includes 9 stunning home page demos for a classic Nordic-inspired store, creative fashion, modern clothing, minimal furniture and elegant jewel store.

Every page, module and feature of Halena has been crafted with meticulous attention to detail so that all the hard work is done for you! Powered by WooCommerce, your Shopping Cart, Checkout, Product Filters and Top Related Product widgets – and much more! – are ready and waiting. Simply import a demo in a single click, and then use the intuitive Theme Options panel to customize every element.

Beneath the clean and minimal surface of this modern, responsive eCommerce WordPress theme, Halena is packed with every AJAX feature you could wish for, including the most advanced AJAX filter, so that shoppers can explore your products and find exactly what they’re looking for.

Find out for yourself why Halena Minimal & Modern eCommerce WordPress Theme is the best choice for you and your users.

Important: Users who’re all updating to Halena 1.5 also need to update its required plugin Agni Halena to 1.1

Latest Version 1.6.2 Change Log

Overview

Most complete WordPress shop theme with over 4 current minimal & modern layouts pre-built right out of the box, and the easy to use Demo Importer, you will be up and running with no fuss in the shortest time possible.

Each shop demo has a unique set-up designed with different types of ecommerce websites in mind, so that all the hard work is done for you. Best suitable for any kind of ecommerce website especially fashion store, clothing store, nordic inspired store, furniture shop.

The Best Choice For Shoppers:

WooCommerce has been carefully considered and implemented as a core component of the websites templates so that your new ecommerce storefront will be a cinch to implement with Halena. Shopping Carts, Checkout Pages, Product Filters,  and Top Related Product Widgets are all included and simply await you and your beautiful content.

ADVANCED SEARCH & FILTER

Halena is the most complete and advanced AJAX filter theme on ThemeForest, allowing users to combine multiple attributes with the AND/OR query choice. With AJAX search, Halena instantly displays the results without navigating away from the page, for a quick and smooth shopping experience that leads users directly to the products they’ll love.

THE ULTIMATE PRODUCT SHOWCASE

Halena’s unique single product styles include the ability to show a short video clip or 360 degree view of each product, so that users can check out your products from every angle and get a dynamic sense of what they’re missing out on. With awesome hover, zoom and lightbox gallery features, you really can showcase your products to the max.

QUICKVIEW & LOOKBOOK

The custom made, in-built product quickview is simple and straightforward, with lots of room to grow. Your users can quickly and effortlessly check out your products and fall in love at first sight! This complete eCommerce WordPress theme also includes a unique lookbook, with responsive hotspot pins shortcodes, so you can add single or multiple pins to any image. Pins are AJAX enabled, so the shopping experience is just as seamless as on any other page within your shop.

CATALOG & WISHLIST

You can use the Catalog mode with or without purchasing ability by switching price tags on/off in the Theme Options panel. Simply show off your latest collection, or offer users another way to browse and shop. Halena has also been customized and styled for the famous YITH wishlist plugin, so users can add the products they love in a single click – either from the main shop or from individual product pages.

ACCOUNT & ORDER TRACKING

You can use the Catalog mode with or without purchasing ability by switching price tags on/off in the Theme Options panel. Simply show off your latest collection, or offer users another way to browse and shop. Halena has also been customized and styled for the famous YITH wishlist plugin, so users can add the products they love in a single click – either from the main shop or from individual product pages.

The Best Choice For You:

You also save precious development time and money with the included WPBakery Page Builder Plugin, saving you $$ from the outset, you are also guaranteed full compatibility with all of Halena’s templates ­ no coding required.

DRAG & DROP PAGE BUILDER

Halena saves you time and money from day one! The popular WPBakery Page Builder plugin is included, for ultimate creativity and flexibility, without the fuss. All of Halena’s templates have been built using this page builder, so every section, module and element is easy to edit and customize, using drag and drop tools.

GET STARTED IN ONE CLICK

Get a full demo in a single click, and start creating your unique eCommerce site today! Choose from 4 pre-built templates, and even mix and match elements from multiple demos. The Theme Options panel uses the Redux framework, so you can change your layout and settings at any time, and control almost every element, with the help of the user-friendly interface.

MAKE IT YOUR OWN

Fonts and Icons:
As well as 800+ ready to use Google fonts, this complete eCommerce WordPress theme includes custom made tools for adding TypeKit and unlimited custom fonts, so your online store can be as unique as you are. Halena also comes with 5 font libraries (Linea, Stroke, Ionicons, Font Awesome and WebFont Medical Icons), giving you access to 2500+ icon fonts, and you can even upload your own SVG icons.
Header Styles:
More than 15 header variations are included, with advanced customization options, so you can play around in Theme Options and find the look that’s right for you.
Content Blocks:
You can build blocks in the same way you build your pages. Each content block will act like a shortcode, so you can place it almost anywhere.
Revolution Slider:
4 unique sliders have been created, especially for Halena, and you can even create your own using Revolution Slider. If you see an example that you like on the Revolution Slider plugin page, let us know after your purchase of Halena and we’ll send it your way!
Tons of Customizable Elements:
Halena is packed with every element you could need for your modern eCommerce site, and each one comes in a range of styles to suit your look and feel. Add customizable pricing tables, progress bars and dynamic milestone counters, various blockquotes, and a choice of button styles and call to action variations. You can also integrate Google Maps, in a choice of styles, to let your users know where to find you. Check out the demo for even more outstanding features and editable elements!

LAUNCH YOUR BLOG OR PORTFOLIO

Halena offers a great range of blog and portfolio layouts, including grid, masonry and carousel options. Add up to 5 columns, customize widths, and combine with sidebars to create 30+ different portfolio and blog layouts to keep your users engaged with your awesome content.

GO GLOBAL

Halena has been rigorously tested with WPML & qTranslate X plugins so it is ready to take your eCommerce store global. It even features a unique language bar in the header menu to make it easier than ever for international users to toggle the language. Halena is also fully compatible with RTL languages, such as Hebrew and Arabic.



Halena is uniquely designed to give your shoppers the very best user experience across all devices, and to make it quicker and easier than ever for you to create a fully customized online store, with all the features of WooCommerce and all the power of AJAX. If you have any problems with this modern and minimal eCommerce WordPress theme, we’re here to help, 24/7.

Main Shop Features:

  • Complete eCommerce theme built with Woocommerce
  • Ajax product filter (you can even filter categories)
  • Ajax product search
  • Ajax cart
  • Ajax sidebar cart
  • Ajax shop pagination
  • Quickview
  • Wishlist (YITH wishlist)
  • single product 360 degree image
  • single product video
  • Customized product lightbox
  • single product Color swatches
  • sale label variations
  • Infinite scroll
  • Category grid variations
  • Responsive Lookbook (hotspot pin)
  • Cookie based Newsletter popup
  • Unique Megamenu
  • Image swap option (exclusive)
  • Category box (exclusive)
  • Fancy Image (exclusive)
  • Awesome single product variations.
  • Shortnote option on all pages
  • WooCommerce Currency Switcher Supported
  • Complete eCommerce theme built with Woocommerce
  • 100% compatible with WooCommerce Stripe Gateway
  • 100% compatible with WooCommerce PayPal Express Checkout Gateway
  • Catalog Mode
  • Sticky Add to cart bar at Single Product page

And There’s More!

  • Minimal & modern home pages
  • Bootstrap 3 support
  • Clean shop inner layout
  • Responsive Design
  • SVG Support
  • One Click Demo Install
  • Content Blocks
  • Redux Option panel
  • Video Backgrounds
  • Unlimited Custom Fonts
  • 800+ Google Fonts
  • 2300+ Typekit Fonts
  • Mobile friendly
  • 2500+ Icon Fonts
  • Advance Portfolio & grid system
  • Duotone (Gradient Map) & gradient overlay
  • SVG Icons with Animations
  • Particles Background
  • Retina Ready display
  • Smooth Animations to all elements/modules
  • Sticky header Menu
  • Posttype Carousels
  • Blog & Portfolio pages Post formats
  • Contact form 7, mailchimp for wp supported
  • Dynamic Blog Sidebar widgets
  • Google maps integration
  • Pricing tables, Milestones
  • Touch support
  • 5 Header Styles
  • Many Footer Variations
  • SEO optimized
  • Crossbrowser compatible
  • Social share option
  • WPML & qTranslate X tested
  • Complete Woocommerce Integration
  • Infinite Scroll
  • Parallax Images & Backgrounds
  • Maintenance Mode
  • Best Support 24×7
You can buy Larsseit font for $37 here
We tried our best to provide best user experience across all the devices.

items.name: MusicFlex - WordPress Theme for Musicians

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Multipurpose Music WordPress Theme

items.description:
MusicFlex – Music WordPress Theme for Bands & Musicians is a complete, flexible and simple to use theme for the music industry.

The design can be fully customized with minimum effort, making this theme suitable for musicians, music bands, solo music artists, guitarists, pianists, drummers, bassists & music artists of any music genre such as rock, pop, hip hop, jazz etc. It is fully responsive and highly optimized for mobile and tablet devices. Follow the link below to check out our Backend Admin panel!

New demos & ideas will be presented regularly

We are aiming on covering the widest possible range of the Music Industry Niche by offering carefully crafted demos that meet your business’s specific needs. Every demo is easily imported to our theme with our “One-Click” demo importer.

RAP & TRAP FULL PAGE DEMO

SINGLE MUSICIAN DRUMMER FULL PAGE DEMO

ROCK BAND FULL PAGE DEMO

A Premium WordPress Theme for the Music Industry

Simple, Clean and Ready to use, it will meet your Specific Needs!

Included Plugins

  • WPBakery Visual Composer is included in all our themes and customized with extra options and shortcodes! Plethora Themes is legally authorized by the plugin author ( WPBakery ) to distribute the fully featured Visual Composer plugin along with this theme. Technical support for theme bundled Visual Composer plugin is provided solely by Plethora Themes. Plugin updates are provided via the theme, meaning that the latest approved Visual Composer plugin version will always be included on each theme update (related admin notices appear, so you will not miss it!).

Features:

  • Grid & slider elements to display your posts, releases, shows and band member profiles
  • Fully Translatable. POT file is included and the theme is compatible with WPML and Polylang plugins.
  • Flexible release elements display, with the Release Info shortcode. You may include any release information as a separate element within a page ( such as the release cover, tracklist, purchase links, press reviews, etc. )
  • Tour Schedule element that can display shows using various filters ( futury only, past only, tickets availability status & categorized by tour ),
  • Timeline element for easier display of your Bands History.
  • Instagram Feed plugin shortcode support.
  • Mailchimp Form plugin shortcode support.
  • Contact Form 7 plugin shortcode support.
  • Dozens of design & typography elements, to create your unique layouts
  • Heading groups
  • Teaserboxes
  • Counter
  • Socials
  • Buttons
  • Counter
  • Compatibility with a variety of music shop platforms, including iTunes, Google Play, Bandcamp, Spotify, Amazon Mp3, and Deezer

Clarivo – Multipurpose Medical and Pharmacy WordPress theme is suitable for any kind of pharmacy shop, pharmacy store, doctor, health clinics and medical organizations… to build their own work.

With special functions you can build your attractive online store, online shop for pharmacy. And with super clean, elegant and modern design your site will more attractive with customer and perfect to promote yourself, your own work.

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Insurance and Finance WordPress Theme

items.description:
Want to create an incredible Insurance & Finance website based on WordPress? Sick of testing and evaluating themes? Choose the ONE completely versatile theme you can use to create the website you need.

Permanently updated, with reliable support and amazing features:

  • WPBakery Page Builder
  • Slider Revolution
    • (*) – Dummy sliders included in the package;
  • Video & Background Parallax
  • Redux Framework Theme-Options Panel
    • General Settings
    • Unlimited Sidebars
    • Styling Settings
    • Header Settings
    • Footer Settings
    • Contact Settings
    • Blog Settings
    • 404 Page Settings
    • Social Media Settings
    • MailChimp Newsletter
    • Demo Data Importer
  • Multiple header variants
  • One-click importer
  • 600+ Google Fonts
  • Font Icons instead of images
  • Well documented
  • PHP-Ajax Contact Form
  • Various Custom Widgets and much more
  • Multiple Colors & Skins Throughout
  • Eye-catching CSS Animations
  • Compatible with: Contact form 7
  • Permanent updates
  • Excellent Typography
  • Optimized for high speed
  • Fast and easy to use

In the case you made a purchase by mistake or for features that don’t exist:

We do not provide refunds for these sorts of mistaken purchases. Due to the nature of digital goods, it’s not possible to “return” them. Therefore, refunds can only be given for products that are broken, but this is not the case, as our theme has been reviewed and accepted by an Envato review team.

Getting in touch with the ModelTheme crew and also with other customers of the ModelTheme Themes was never so easy.

wordpress_theme_metadata.description: Petmark is a new WordPress theme for Online Shopping. With this theme, we have presets and different layouts. With drag and drop home page layout manager, we can build many variations of home page layout. We also have ajax cart, wishlist, compare, zoom and fancybox to bring into a modern look of website. items.description:
Petmark for WooCommerce WordPress theme include many features and a nice design. It’s great for selling pet, pet food, pet supplies. Structure is clear and arrangement is logic which make modern feeling for this website.

Petmark theme is fully responsive and adapt W3C school standard. Using Bootstrap 3 to divide structure of this website more clearly. Green and blue are main colors and white and grey background. Add to cart button is styled smoothly with border radius and Wishlist, Compare are circle. Tabs Products Slider, New Products Slider, Tabs Category Slider – in each module of each home page, there is one big product which is shown in slider and customers can click representative image on the side to see next products. Daily Deals module shows timer countdown and description of products. Text blocks are related to pet, pet food, pet supplies and very beautiful. Titles are underline and white with green or blue background. You can use Theme Options to change text color, background of this website with choose color from palette or set color code.

Experience with Petmark responsive WooCommerce template and let it become your great online store!

Overview
